title: Foodify - A food ordering website
description: This is a project made with complete MERN stack that allows user to order food items after secured and authentic registration.

title: THREAD - A chat app
description: A responsive real-time chat application using the MERN stack, with features like user authentication, unread message tracking, and efficient state management

title: Book-IT
description: This is a project made with complete React js. It is a hotel booking website.

title: IPL - EDA
description: It is a Exploratory-Data-Analysis on IPL dataset that uses Python-pySpark and SQL.
